definition: surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
Susan Boyle (1961-), competitor in UK reality TV competition

sentences.english: This was the call Susan worked so hard to receive.
sentences.chinese: 这个电话对苏珊来说是得之不易的。

sentences.english: Susan has 'luck' with ferns. No one can grow them like her.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊在蕨草方面很幸运，没有人能像她那样种活他们。

sentences.english: I thought I saw Susanna, Coming down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 在梦中见苏珊娜，漫步下山来相迎。

sentences.english: There was only one person in Townsville at this moment to whom she could appeal for a hearing.
sentences.chinese: 现在镇子上唯一一个能够倾听她说话的人就是苏珊了。

sentences.english: Susan asked the woman who must be Jacob's wife.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊问这个肯定是雅各布的妻子的女人。

sentences.english: Tears of happiness poured down Sussan's cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 幸福的泪水滑下苏珊的脸颊。

sentences.english: She just finished college . the employees became even more concerned during Susan's first month on the job.
sentences.chinese: 在苏珊工作的第一个月期间，员工们更加担心。？

sentences.english: She was kind, intelligent and loveable , like Susan.
sentences.chinese: 她和苏珊一样很和蔼，聪明，可爱。

sentences.english: Unaccustomed to city life, Susan pined for her native hills and streams.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊过不惯城市生活，非常想念她家乡的山山水水。

sentences.english: She and I loaded her mom's black Chevy Beretta to the ceiling with the Easter baskets.
sentences.chinese: 我和苏珊把她妈妈的黑色贝里塔车装满了复活节礼筐。

sentences.english: Susan filled her guests with the finest food.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊用上好的食物飨客。

sentences.english: Susanna wears a sweater and trousers today.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊娜今天穿了件长袖衫和裤子。

sentences.english: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊娜上学时赢得了书法奖。

sentences.english: Susan and Ned were driving through a wooded empty section of highway.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊和内德的车正行至一段树木繁茂的公路段。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
